That username was taken!
Please choose another.
You have been logged out due to inactivity.
We need to register an account for you.
We need to link your Steam account to a Town of Salem account so we can credit you with all your exclusive Steam rewards. Click one of the options below to continue.
If you already have an existing TOS account:
If you do not already have an existing TOS account:

To link your Steam account to your existing Town of Salem account, enter your Town of Salem username and password below. Do NOT enter your Steam account name unless it's identical to your Town of Salem account name.
Okay, so you don't have an existing Town of Salem account? Let's create a new one and link it to your Steam account.
Optional: If you have a friend who invited you to play Town of Salem, enter their account name below.
Want to know why? Click me to learn more!
You cannot accept an invite for a second game. Please play or leave the first game before accepting this invite.
Start countdown canceled due to player leaving.
There must be at least %number% players in the game.
You already own all items of this type. Please make another selection.
There was an unbalanced number of players to fill all games. You were one of the most recent players to queue and have been put at the front of the next queue.
You left a match early. You must wait before you can join another one.
Instructions: Click the friend's name you wish to add to the invite list.
more votes are needed to repick the host.
First Win of the Day bonus available.
First Win of the Day bonus available in

Normal games are games with a pre-set role list. They include Classic, which is usually for beginners, and Ranked Practice, of which 10 games are needed to unlocked ranked, and Ranked which requires you to have played 50 games with 10 of those being ranked practice games.
Custom games allow you to pick and choose your own role list. Custom is just a regular game with the host chosen role list. Rapid Mode has reduced time in each phase to speed up gameplay.

Chaos games include pre-set role lists that are meant to be fun! All Any games include 15 Any roles, Rainbow is a role list that covers all the roles of the Rainbow, and Vigilantics is a Witch vs Vigilantes game.
Classic mode has a smaller variety of roles and less random roles.
Custom mode has access to all roles.
All Any mode has a role list of Any roles.
Rapid mode has much faster discussion and night phases.
For experienced, competitive players. You must have at least 50 games played, with 10 of those being ranked practice games, before you can play Ranked.
A practice mode for ranked competitive play. You must have at least 50 games played, with 10 of those being in this ranked practice mode, before you can play Ranked.
How to play Town of Salem.
The party you are trying to join is either full or no longer exists!
Cannot have more than %mafia% Mafia roles.
Cannot have more than 3 Any roles.
Cannot have more than %number% of any particular role in Custom/Rapid games.
Number of selected roles not equal to number of users.
There are no roles left to remove.
You must have a Godfather or Mafioso with the Mafia.
You must have a Vampire with a Vampire Hunter.
You must have opposing factions in the game.
You must select a role to add to the list.
You must select a role to remove.
Click me to check out our Facebook!
Type /repick to vote for a new host.
You must have at least 7 players to repick the host.
is now the host of the party.
are now the host of the party.
now has the power to invite people to the party.
An ex-soldier who secretly makes a living by selling protection.
This role has the ability to guard one person at night. If someone attacks the guarded player then the attacker and the bodyguard will die instead of the guarded player.
A surgeon skilled in trauma care who secretly heals people.
This role has the ability to save someone from death at night.
A beautiful woman skilled in distraction.
This role has the ability to occupy someones night preventing them from using their night ability.
A private eye who secretly gathers information.
This role has the ability to check someone at night, revealing more information about their role.
A prison guard who secretly detains suspects.
This role has the ability to jail someone at night role blocking them. The jailor can secretly talk to the detainee and optionally execute them.
An eagle-eyed observer, stealthly camping outside houses to gain information.
This role has the ability to watch someone at night. The lookout will see everyone who visits their target that night.
This role has the ability to reveal themselves to the town. Once the Mayor has revealed, their vote counts as 3 votes.
A secret psychic who talks with the dead.
This role has the ability to talk with one dead person each night.
A powerful mystic who will give one person a second chance at life.
This role has the ability to resurrect one Town member.
The law enforcer of the town forced into hiding from threat of murder.
This role has the ability to check one person at night for criminal activity.
A stealthy eavesdropper who listens in on secret conversations.
This role has the ability to hear what people in the mafia say at night. The spy can also hear private messages between players.
A man who transports people without asking any questions.
This role has the ability to transport two people, swapping all actions taken against them at night.
A priest turned monster hunter, this person slays Vampires.
This role has the ability to check for vampires each night. They cannot be converted to be a vampire, if bitten they will kill the vampire instead.
A paranoid war hero who will shoot anyone who visits.
This role has the ability to go on alert at night, shooting anyone who visits.
A corrupt cop who takes the law into your own hands.
This role has the ability to shoot someone at night.
An eavesdropper who uses information to keep people quiet.
This role has the ability to stop someone from talking during the next day.
A corrupted investigator who gathers information for the Mafia.
This role has the ability to identify one person's role each night.
A beautiful dancer working for organized crime.
This role has the ability to distract one person at night, preventing them from performing their night ability.
A master of disguise who pretends to be other roles.
This role has the ability to disguise as another player's role.
A crooked lawyer that replaces documents.
This role has the ability to rewrite last wills, changing the content displayed upon death.
A skilled counterfeiter who manipulates information.
This role has the ability to frame someone at night, changing the information investigative roles will receive on the target that night.
This role has the ability to kill someone at night. The Godfather will appear to be a town member to investigative roles.
A sanitation expert working for organized crime.
This role has the ability to clean up a dead body keeping the role and last will from being revealed.
A member of organized crime, trying to work their way to the top.
This role will do the Godfather's dirty work, keeping the Godfather from being revealed. If the Godfather dies the Mafioso will become the Godfather.
A trauma patient that does not remember who they were.
This role has the ability to become another role from the graveyard.
A pyromaniac that wants to burn everyone.
This role has the ability to either douse someone in gas or ignite all previously doused targets.
An obsessed lyncher who will stop at nothing to execute their target.
This role wins if their target is lynched while the executioner is still alive.
A crazed lunatic whose life goal is to be publicly executed.
This role wins if they are lynched. The following night one of the guilty voters will commit suicide.
A psychotic criminal who wants everyone to die.
This role has the ability to kill someone each night. If a role blocker visits the Serial Killer the role blocker will die.
A neutral character who just wants to live.
This role will win with anyone as long as they live to the end.
A blood thirsty Vampire that bites and converts humans to Vampires at night.
This role converts town members and some neutral characters into Vampires at night. Vampires vote as a faction on who to bite and are able to communicate at night.
A lone citizen that transforms during the full moon.
This role has the ability to transform during the full moon and slaughter mass amounts of people.
A voodoo master who can control other peoples actions.
This role has the ability to control someone else and force them to use their night ability on the witches target.
Can be Investigator, Lookout, Sheriff, or Spy.
Can be Jailor, Veteran or Vigilante.
Can be Escort, Mayor, Medium, Retributionist, or Transporter.
Can be Consigliere, Consort, or Blackmailer.
Can be Disguiser, Forger, Framer or Janitor.
Can be Executioner, Jester or Witch.
Can be Arsonist, Serial Killer or Werewolf.
Can be any role in the game.
Your name may not exceed 16 characters.
Name may only contain letters and spaces.
Name may not contain consecutive capital letters.
Name may not have initial spaces.
Name may not have trailing spaces.
Name may not contain double spaces.
Enable the chat filter to replace potentially abusive or bullying language.
Hide My Customizations From Other Players
Opens a link to show all of the roles in Town of Salem.

Feeling lost?

Thanks for helping us keep a bug free game!
Visit our forums to report a bug.
Language selection may only be changed from the Options screen available at the Login screen. Please log out of the application and make your selection before logging in.
This scroll will not be used.
Equip scrolls to change your odds of receiving certain roles.

You can't equip any more scrolls.

Name must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 20 characters!

Names may only contain upper and lower case letters, or numbers. (a-z, A-Z, 0-9)
No spaces or special characters are allowed.
The name '%name%' is not available. Please choose another name.

Account Name Change Required.
You have been flagged for a mandatory account name change. Please change your account name.

'%name%' is your new account name.
You will now need to use this name to log into the game and the forums.
Cannot change account name. You have not purchased an account name change and you have not been flagged for mandatory name change.
Cannot change account name. Unrecognized response received.

Change your username for $4.99 USD?
Your chosen username is not reserved. You will be granted the right to change your name to any available name you wish.

Night falls on the Town of Salem.
May God have mercy on your soul
, you are on trial for conspiracy against the town.
You cannot chat or whisper while blackmailed.
A member of the mafia visited
If no one dies by tomorrow the game will end in a draw.
You were bitten by a Vampire!
All of the Vampires are gone. You are now a Vigilante!
Please do not spam the chat.
You cannot ignore yourself, that would be weird.
We found a will next to their body.
We could not find a last will.
We found a death note next to their body.
-Protect one person from death at night.
-If your target is attacked both you and your attacker will die instead. -If you successfully protect someone you can still be healed. -Your counterattack ignores night immunity.
-Heal one person each night, preventing them from dying.
-You may only heal yourself once. -You will know if your target is attacked.
-Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. -You are immune to role blocks.
-Investigate one person each night for a clue to their role.
-You may choose one person during the day to jail for the night.
-You may anonymously talk with your prisoner. -You can choose to execute your prisoner. -The jailed target can't perform their night ability. -While jailed the prisoner is safe from all attacks.
-Watch one person at night to see who visits them.
-You may reveal yourself as the Mayor of the Town.
-Once you have revealed yourself as Mayor your vote counts as 3 votes. -You may not be healed once you have revealed yourself. - Once revealed you can't whisper, or be whispered to.
-When dead speak to a living person at night.
-You will speak to the dead anonymously each night you are alive. -You may only speak to a living person once.
-You may revive a dead Town member.
-Check one person each night for suspicious activity.
-You will know if your target is a member of the Mafia, except for the Godfather. -You will know if your target is a Serial Killer.
-You can secretly listen to the Mafia at night.
-You can hear private messages. -You will know who the Mafia visit at night.
-Choose two people to transport at night.
-Transporting two people swaps all targets against them. -You may transport yourself. -Your targets will know they were transported.
-If you find a Vampire you will stake them in the heart. -If a Vampire visits you they will be staked. -You can hear Vampires at night. -If you kill all Vampires you will become a Vigilante.
-Decide if you will go on alert.
-While on alert you cannot be killed at night. -If anyone visits you while you are on alert they will be shot. -You can only go on alert 3 times. -You are immune to role blocks.
-Choose to take justice into your own hands and shoot someone.
-If you shoot another Town member you will commit suicide over the guilt. -You can only shoot your gun 3 times.
-Choose one person each night to blackmail.
-Blackmailed targets cannot talk during the day. -You can hear private messages. -If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. -You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Check one person for their exact role each night.
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. -You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. -If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. -You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Choose a target to disguise yourself as.
-You will appear to be the role of your target to the Investigator. -If you are killed you will appear to be the role of your target.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Choose a person and rewrite their last will at night.
-If your target dies their last will is replaced with your forgery. -You may only perform 3 forgeries.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-If your target is investigated they will appear to be a member of the Mafia. -If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-You can't be killed at night. -If there is a Mafioso he will attack the target instead of you. -You will appear to be a Town member to the Sheriff. -You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Choose a person to clean at night.
-If your target dies their role and last will won't be revealed to the Town. -Only you will see the cleaned targets role and last will. -You may only perform 3 cleanings.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-You can kill if the Godfather doesn't give you orders. -If the Godfather dies you will become the next Godfather. -You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.
-Remember who you were by selecting a graveyard role.
-When you choose a role it will be revealed to the Town. -You can't choose a unique role.
Remember who you were and complete that roles objectives.
-Douse someone in gasoline or ignite all doused targets

-Targets will not know that they are doused in gasoline. -Death from fire can't be prevented by healing or night immunities. -Select yourself to ignite doused people. -Doused players will appear to the Investigator as Godfather, Bodyguard, or Arsonist.
-Trick the Town into lynching your target.
-Your target is %name% -If your target is killed at night you will become a Jester.
Get your target lynched at any cost.
-Trick the Town into voting against you.
-If you are lynched you will kill one of your guilty voters the following night.
Get yourself lynched by any means necessary.
-If you are role blocked you will attack the role blocker instead of your target. -You cannot be killed at night.
Kill everyone who would oppose you.
-Put on a bulletproof vest at night, protecting you from attacks.
-You can only use the bulletproof vest 4 times.
Live until the end of the game.
-Vampires vote at night to bite a target. -The youngest Vampire will visit the target at night. -You must wait 1 night between conversions.
Convert everyone who would oppose you.
-Transform into a Werewolf during the full moon.
-As a Werewolf you cannot be killed at night. -As a Werewolf you will attack your victim and anyone that visits them. -Your attack goes through night immunity.
Kill everyone who would oppose you.
-You can only control targetable actions such as detection and killing. -You can force people to target themselves. -Your victim will know they are being controlled.
Survive to see the Town lose the game.
You have already reported %player% this game.
A report has been filed for %player%.

Leave the game?
(You will not be awarded merit points if you leave early.)

You can still help your team!
Are you sure you want to leave?
(You will not be awarded merit points and you may have to wait before you can join another game if you leave now.)
* Merit Points calculated based on game length

Please fill out the form completely.
Email is not a valid email!

Username was empty!
Please fill out the form completely.
Username must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 20 characters!
Your friend's username is invalid. It must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 20 characters, or it can be blank."

A Password field was empty!
Please fill out the form completely.

Password contains invalid characters!
Please do not use characters such as \' or \"
Password must be at least 6 characters long and no more than 32 characters!
You may target %name% with the following taunts:
You don't own any taunts with which to target %name%.
You taunted someone too recently. Please wait.
This taunt can't be used on that target.
You can't use that taunt right now.
This taunt can only be used in the Discussion Phase.
This taunt can only be used in the Night Phase.
This taunt can only be used in the Discussion Phase or Night Phase.
Taunt failed, phase is ending soon.
You can't do that right now.
Tip: Nice players win more games.
Tip: Jesters want to be hanged.
Tip: You can report players by using the red ! mark at the top of the screen.
Tip: Randomly lynching a player favors the evil roles.
Tip: The Arsonist can clean the gas off of themselves if they take no action at night.
Tip: Multiple Executioners can have the same target, but they cant have the Jailor or Mayor as a target.
Tip: The Transporter can swap two players at night causing players that target one to target the other.
Tip: If the Godfather is roleblocked the Mafioso will kill the target the Mafioso selected, and vice versa.
Tip: An Escort/Consort will be killed if they roleblock a Serial Killer. This does not always mean the target they visited the night they died was the Serial Killer though.
Tip: If you would like to help get rid of toxic players be sure to check out the Trial System!
Tip: A Survivor can be the difference between winning the game by one vote, or losing because your team didnt have enough.
Tip: Type /w [name] [message] without the brackets[] to whisper a player. You can also use a player's position number instead of their name.
Tip: Scrolls don't guarantee that you get a role, but they increase your chances a large amount.
Tip: Scrolls only increase your chances of getting a role if that role is in the game.
Tip: Scrolls do not work in Ranked games!
